p: Experiments of size distribution and zeta potential were done in triplicate and the data were presented as mean Â± SD. The percentage of mosquito bites reduction data were analyzed by using SPSS Ver. 22 software. These data analyzed by split-plot ANOVA (SPANOVA) to identify mean differences between each lotion formulation and concentration over time. Prior this analysis, the data had to be transformed using the arcsine-square root transformation to better reach the parametric assumptions. A value of P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
